availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Clayton C. Bell (Estill County, Kentucky merchant and 1st Lt. in 14th Ky Cav US)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky merchant and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Olivia P. Mosely Bell in Estill County, Kentucky, on November 27, 1855. Father of Clemence H. Bell, Thomas G. Bell, and John C. Bell. Merchant in Estill County in 1860. Served in Company C of the 14th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A) as a 1st lieutenant from August 21, 1862 to September 16, 1863.

ab.bibl:

Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0128.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film #000254628, p. 198.
